title: RoadMovie 2.7.4 – Subtitle, batch-encode and upload your movies

title: CleanUSBDrive 1.0.2 – The fastest DS_Store remover for external drives

title: PicGIF 2.0.8 – Convert photos and videos into incredible GIFs quickly
content: PicGIF enables you to quickly create incredible animated GIFs from photos or short videos. title: Folder icon designer 3 – Icons for folder customization

title: Browserism 2.3 – Easily switch your default browser

title: Keyboard Pilot 1.8.1 – Switch keyboard layout for different applications
content: Let Keyboard Pilot take over switching keyboard layouts for different apps.
